trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Set-Location
trans-unit.target: Set-Location

trans-unit.source: Set-Location
trans-unit.target: Set-Location

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Sets the current working location to a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 将当前工作位置设置为指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路径 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Stack
trans-unit.target: 堆栈

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The Set-Location cmdlet sets the working location to a specified location.
trans-unit.target: Set-Location cmdlet 将工作位置设置为指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: That location could be a directory, a sub-directory, a registry location, or any provider path.
trans-unit.target: 该位置可以是目录、子目录、注册表位置或任何提供程序路径。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the StackName parameter of the Set-Location cmdlet to make a named location stack the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以使用 Set-Location cmdlet 的 StackName 参数将某个已命名位置堆栈设为当前位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: For more information about location stacks, see the Notes.
trans-unit.target: 有关位置堆栈的详细信息，请参阅“备注”。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: This command sets the current location to the root of the HKLM: drive.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将当前位置设置为根 HKLM︰ 驱动器。

trans-unit.source: This command sets the current location to the root of the Env: drive.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将当前位置设置为 Env: 驱动器的根目录。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Passthru parameter to direct Windows PowerShell to return a PathInfo (System.Management.Automation.PathInfo) object that represents the Env: location.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 Passthru 参数来指示 Windows PowerShell 返回表示 Env: 位置的 PathInfo (System.Management.Automation.PathInfo) 对象。

trans-unit.source: This command sets the current location C: drive in the file system provider.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将文件系统提供程序中的当前位置设置为 C: 驱动器。

trans-unit.source: This command makes the WSManPaths location stack the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将 WSManPaths 位置堆栈设为当前位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: The location cmdlets use the current location stack unless a different location stack is specified in the command.
trans-unit.target: 除非在命令中指定了其他位置堆栈，否则位置 cmdlet 将使用当前位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: For information about location stacks, see the Notes.
trans-unit.target: 有关位置堆栈的信息，请参阅“备注”。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies a path to the location.
trans-unit.target: 指定位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: The value of the LiteralPath parameter is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: LiteralPath 参数的值严格按照所键入的形式使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 不会将任何字符解释为通配符。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径包括转义符，请将其括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 单引号会告知 Windows PowerShell 不要将所有字符都解释为转义序列。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns a System.Management.Automation.PathInfo object that represents the location.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示位置的 System.Management.Automation.PathInfo 对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此 cmdlet 将不产生任何输出。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used to specify the path to a new working location.
trans-unit.target: 此参数用于指定新工作位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: -StackName
trans-unit.target: -StackName

trans-unit.source: Makes the specified location stack the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的位置堆栈设为当前位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Enter a location stack name.
trans-unit.target: 输入位置堆栈名称。

trans-unit.source: To indicate the unnamed default location stack, type "$null" or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要指明未命名的默认位置堆栈，请键入“$null”或一个空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The Location cmdlets act on the current stack unless you use the StackName parameter to specify a different stack.
trans-unit.target: 除非你使用 StackName 参数指定其他堆栈，否则位置 cmdlet 将作用于当前堆栈。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在活动事务中使用该命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can only be used when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，才使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Transactions.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Transactions。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path (but not a literal path) to Set-Location.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过管道将包含路径（但不是文本路径）的字符串传递给 Set-Location。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None, System.Management.Automation.PathInfo, System.Management.Automation.PathInfoStack
trans-unit.target: 无、 System.Management.Automation.PathInfo，System.Management.Automation.PathInfoStack

trans-unit.source: When you use the PassThru parameter, Set-Location generates a System.Management.Automation.PathInfo object that represents the location.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是 PassThru 参数，则 Set-Location 生成表示位置的 System.Management.Automation.PathInfo 对象。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The Set-Location cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: Set-Location cmdlet 用于处理由任何提供程序公开的数据。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type "Get-PSProvider".
trans-unit.target: 若要列出会话中可用的提供程序，请键入“Get-PSProvider”。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: A "stack" is a last-in, first-out list in which only the most recently added item is accessible.
trans-unit.target: “堆栈”是一种后进先出的列表，在其中只能访问最后添加的项。

trans-unit.source: You add items to a stack in the order that you use them, and then retrieve them for use in the reverse order.
trans-unit.target: 采用要使用项的顺序将这些项添加到堆栈，然后采用相反顺序检索这些项以供使用。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell lets you store provider locations in location stacks.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 可帮助你在位置堆栈中存储提供程序位置。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell creates an unnamed default location stack and you can create multiple named location stacks.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 创建一个未命名的默认位置堆栈，你可以创建多个命名的位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a stack name, Windows PowerShell uses the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定位置堆栈，则 Windows PowerShell 使用当前位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: By default, the unnamed default location is the current location stack, but you can use the Set-Location cmdlet to change the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未命名的默认位置为当前位置堆栈，但你可以使用 Set-Location cmdlet 来更改当前位置堆栈。

trans-unit.source: To manage location stacks, use the Windows PowerShell Location cmdlets, as follows.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理位置堆栈，请使用 Windows PowerShell 位置 cmdlet，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: To add a location to a location stack, use the Push-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要将某个位置添加到某个位置堆栈，请使用 Push-location cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To get a location from a location stack, use the Pop-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要从某个位置堆栈获取位置，请使用 Pop-location cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To display the locations in the current location stack, use the Stack parameter of the Get-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示当前位置堆栈中的位置，请使用 Get-location cmdlet 的 Stack 参数。

trans-unit.source: To display the locations in a named location stack, use the StackName parameter of the Get-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示命名位置堆栈中的位置，请使用 Get-Location cmdlet 的 StackName 参数。

trans-unit.source: To create a new location stack, use the StackName parameter of the Push-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新的位置堆栈，请使用 Push-location cmdlet 的 StackName 参数。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a stack that does not exist, Push-Location creates the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了不存在的堆栈，则 Push-Location 创建该堆栈。

trans-unit.source: To make a location stack the current location stack, use the StackName parameter of the Set-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要将某个位置堆栈设为当前位置堆栈，请使用 Set-Location cmdlet 的 StackName 参数。

trans-unit.source: The unnamed default location stack is fully accessible only when it is the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 未命名的默认位置堆栈仅在其是当前位置堆栈时处于完全可访问状态。

trans-unit.source: If you make a named location stack the current location stack, you cannot no longer use Push-Location or Pop-Location cmdlets add or get items from the default stack or use Get-Location command to display the locations in the unnamed stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果使命名位置堆栈成为当前位置堆栈，则不能再使用 Push-Location 或 Pop-Location cmdlet 添加或获取默认堆栈中的项，或者使用 Get-Location 命令显示未命名堆栈中的位置。

trans-unit.source: To make the unnamed stack the current stack, use the StackName parameter of the Set-Location cmdlet with a value of $null or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要使未命名堆栈成为当前堆栈，请使用 Set-Location cmdlet 的 StackName 参数，且值为 $null 或空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: 获得位置

trans-unit.target: Pop-Location

trans-unit.target: Push-Location
